item.title: Add Friend Link in PaperMod Blog
item.description: PaperMod is a good hugo blog theme, but it did not support a friend link officially. So you need to do some simple customize. Full Code Put this shortcode into layouts/shortcodes/friends.html Usage Add your friends in data/friends.yml like this: - title: "伞" intro: "一只咸鱼的学习记录" link: "https://umb.ink/" image: "https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/53655863?v=4" - title: "HelloWorld的小博客" intro: "这里是一个小白的博客" link: "https://mzdluo123.github.io/" image: "https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/23146087?v=4"
